title: Atlassian security advisory (AV25-457)
description: On July 15, 2025, Atlassian published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products :
products: Bamboo Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Bitbucket Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Confluence Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Crowd Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Jira Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Jira Service Management Data Center and Server  multiple versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
